charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking along a
mountain path one day when Silver suddenly
challenged [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] to a battle.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_030: I won’t take no for an answer.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_040: Hmph. I guess that’s enough for today.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_050: Not bad. You held your own against Tyranitar.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_060:
Wild Tyranitar wander through the mountains
seeking opponents to fight, but if they find an
unworthy opponent, they’ll ignore it and move on.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_070:
My Tyranitar also doesn’t bother with opponents it
thinks aren’t worthy.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_080:
So at the very least, it seems my Tyranitar
approves of you.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_0402_120: Hmph. Take it how you will.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_130: But...to be honest, I have to admit you’re strong.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_140:
Only a small handful of folks out there are strong
enough to satisfy Tyranitar.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_150:
We’ve claimed this area as our turf and challenge
any strong-looking Trainers who pass by.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_0401_170:
Tyranitar hatched on Pasio. He doesn’t know
anywhere else...
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_0402_190:
Yeah. I raised him from a Larvitar into what he
is now.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_200: To him, this whole island is basically his turf.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_210:
He hatched from an Egg I got from Eusine a
while back.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_220:
When Eusine gave me the Egg my Tyranitar
hatched from...
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_230:
it was with the hope that I’d be able to make my
dream come true.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_240:
Here on Pasio, Morty was able to become a
sync pair with Ho-Oh.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_250:
And Eusine was able to form a sync pair with
Suicune. Both of their dreams came true.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_260: They apparently thought it was my turn next.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_270: I’ve done my best to meet their expectations.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_280: Tyranitar and I even beat Lance together.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_290:
I guess the pressure from others is what drove me
to get stronger.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_0301_300: No, that’s the power of support!
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_0401_310:
Hmph! Figured you’d say something naive
like that.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_0402_330: What, you got a problem with that?
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_350:
Neo Champions are supposed to be role models
for everyone on Pasio, aren’t they?
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_360: That means it’s your turn next.
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_370:
If you’ve got dreams and goals, then it’s time you
made them a reality, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0133_90_shilver/2301_1201_380:
Tyranitar and I are your role models, so if you
mess up, you’ll have to answer to us! Got it?
